text:
I can replenish my mind with a color./ Noisy light/ In flat glows,/ Blurry diagrams/ Of breezy intersections./

I can refresh my mind with a color./

Amorphous maps of/ Shadow/ Setting, resetting/ Disappearing./ A settling pool of opacities./ I am partly submerged, partly breathing,/ Spines, tendrils, stalks,/ Exposed phylum, stony lichen./
